body: please can you translate into english

Hosizuki/Hoshiduki Melon mentions in their afterword that he/she might continue the aftermath of Mayuko and Tomo in the future. Let's hope Mayuko at least has a bit more stability and sanity of happiness in her life by then.

Last lines are so telling for this bitter-sweet tale...
"I'm happy I can now have a life where I can have sex freely...!!"
Harano Mayuko (はらの まゆこ) misses sex because her husband, supposedly busy with the daily grind of work, has been neglecting her needs for the last 5 years. She has an affair with Tomo, her 10-years-younger designated boytoy, as well as casual sex with his pals... regrets too late, and becomes a "sexually-liberated" Mayu Yun (まゆ ゆん) at the end of her sad "Fallen Married Woman" tale.

Her son even sent his mother's fanza link to his college group

"Oi, my mother drew eromanga wanna read 'em?"
This looks promising. The husband is really cool as heck. The story is quite interesting. Looks worth to read.
